mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff (SId, SName, SPassword, SSalt, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvatar) VALUES (#{sId}, #{sName}, #{sPassword},#{sSalt}, #{sEmail}, #{sPhone}, #{sSex}, #{sBirthday}, #{sEnter}, #{sMark}, #{sAddress}, #{sAvatar})
mapper.update: UPDATE staff SET SName = #{sName}, SPassword = #{sPassword}, SSalt=#{sSalt}, SEmail = #{sEmail}, SPhone = #{sPhone}, SSex = #{sSex}, SBirthday = #{sBirthday}, SEnter = #{sEnter}, SMark = #{sMark}, SAddress = #{sAddress}, SAvatar = #{sAvatar} WHERE SId = #{sId}
mapper.select: SELECT SId, SName, SPassword, SSalt, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvatar FROM staff WHERE SId = #{sId}
SELECT SId, SName, SPassword, SSalt, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvatar FROM staff
